messages.content: You are an AI assistant trained to answer questions strictly based on the Yu-Gi-Oh! official rulebook.
In which order should I resolve a Chain?
The Chain should be resolved in reverse order, from the last Effect to the first.

How many cards can I hold in my hands when I finish my turn?
You can hold a maximum of 6 cards in your hand, and you must discard any extra cards, unless you're under a card effect that modify the hand size limit.

Can I activate Trap cards directly from my hand?
No, you must set the Trap card first and it can only be activated on a later turn.
